courtInstructions: File your response at the [county] County Superior Court. In California, you typically have 5 days to respond to an unlawful detainer lawsuit after being served. The court filing fee can be waived if you qualify for a fee waiver (form FW-001). You must file form UD-105 (Answer-Unlawful Detainer) to contest the eviction. Consider requesting a jury trial by checking the appropriate box and paying the additional fee.
